I need to vent about my car. Not that anyone will care but, yeah. Took about 4  hours today taking every fuckin' terminal and cleaning it all the nuts and bolts all the terminal posts. All the god damn relays I could think of. Shit I even took a wire brush to body ground so hard it burned right through. All in attempts to try an promote some conductivity. So that I can find a short in a wire, or a bad connection. Everything electrical looks brand new now.I've still yet to find the short. New alternator, new battery, new posts , all new connections, and my car is still starving for volts. Cant even fuckin' drive it at night, really. If I do I cant listen to the stereo , so what's the point. As pointless as that entry as it was I still felt the desire to right it. So yeah.
http://burnincerberus.livejournal.com/3222.html

Well I hung out with Case last night for a lil for some cruising in tunes. But some how i managed to get laughed at by more than few people for getting into a tune. Which involves much high pitched notes wild faces, much head banging and,  air guitar o'plenty. Especially at Scheetz where Case pointed at that two chicks were laughing their asses off at my expense. Like i could really give a shit. In the words of Neil Young Rock and Roll can never die. Things are getting worse and my spin on life is deteriorating more and more each day. Getting increasingly hard to put on an illusion of a smile, just to keep the, "What's Wrong?", bashing at bay. Case man can somehow squeeze it out of me but thats about it because I pray more and more each day not to wake up period. They say it's always darkest before you reach the light at the end of the tunnel. I just wonder if I'll stray off course and smash into the fuckin' wall before I reach that light. And if Karma does exist I best win the lottery and get gang banged by all the playmates from the last two years.
